title: El Chapo, Petty, Thousand Oaks Shooting, Comedy Roulette, Sheryl Underwood, Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: El Chapo, Petty, Thousand Oaks Shooting, Comedy Roulette, Sheryl Underwood, Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Ignorance takes the cake for today. El Chapo is a superstar and has a fan base. Por favor believe it! Laura Ingraham is being petty by attacking Taylor Swift. Rick Ross has a baby. A gunman kills 12 in Thousand Oaks, CA. Comedy Roulette is about what happened right when you left the party. Sheryl Underwood is back because she needs mo money. Carla's Reality Update covers Real Housewives of Atlanta and Ready To Love. In Closing Remarks today, Big Dog tells us why we need to get critical of our happiness and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
